title: Observe as I mimic Rito flawlessly
body:
"Trolling is a horrible matter that we refuse to touch with a stick. This is why we implemented a easy to abuse AFK system. Now that they can't afk (and if they do, they won't get punished HOORAY), they can just feed and ruin the game as a whole. So we've changed the ranking elos to be reversed (don't ask why, it was the communities idea).  Because we've done this, we can ruin our own game, piss off the community greatly, enforce trolling while pretending to be against it and still suck the community off all at the same time."

Seriously though. 

The last few days has been nothing but troll after troll after troll after troll. And yes, i'm reporting them. 
However, i've only seen 2-3 effective bans go off. 

So what am I missing?
That Riots condoning trolling and making crap up about being against it?
Intentional feedings ok?
Being a generally crappy person is flawless?

There's something im clearly missing in the "flawless" logic at rito HQ. 

INB4 Downvoting because true (like every other post I seem to make. triggered tumbltards >.>)
